Method.name: CopyFrom
Method.Description: Copies properties (with the same name) from another object into this one. The other object doesn't have to have the same class; properties are matched by name.
Method.Implementation:
Do %code.WriteLine(" Set Cls = Other.%ClassName(1)") Set key = "" For { #dim PropDef As %Dictionary.PropertyDefinition Set PropDef = %class.Properties.GetNext(.key) If key = "" Quit
If PropDef.Private Continue If PropDef.ReadOnly Continue If PropDef.Relationship Continue
Set Name = PropDef.Name If $Extract(Name) = "%" Continue
If PropDef.Collection = "" { Do %code.WriteLine(" If $$$comMemberDefined(Cls, $$$cCLASSproperty, """_Name_""") Set .."_Name_" = Other."_Name) } Else { Do %code.WriteLine(" If $$$comMemberDefined(Cls, $$$cCLASSproperty, """_Name_""") {") Do %code.WriteLine(" Do .."_Name_".Clear() Set k = """"") Do %code.WriteLine(" For { Set val = Other."_Name_".GetNext(.k) Quit:k="""" Do .."_Name_".SetAt(val, k) }") Do %code.WriteLine(" }") } }
Quit $$$OK
